text: Breakfast Club were an American dance-pop band. It used to be Madonna and Randy Jackson. Their hit single "Right On Track" topped #7 on the UK Pop Chart. == Band history == The band was formed in New York City in the late 1970s. Randy Jackson and Madonna left. They recorded an album in the 1980s but it was unofficially released. title: Breakfast Club (band)
